alert.note: Alert for Logan (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 1:30AM CDT until June 18 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL LOGAN...SOUTHEASTERN JOHNSON...NORTHEASTERN YELL AND CENTRAL POPE COUNTIES... At 130 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Holman to near London to Mosley, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Dardanelle... Atkins... Pottsville... Dover... London... Hector... Lake Dardanelle State Park... Carden Bottoms... Broomfield... Mt Nebo State Park... Lake Dardanelle... Galla Creek WMA... Mosley... Taral... Holman... Ranger... Holla Bend... Lutherville... Long Pool Campground... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
